doc:
Ada Adini https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ada_Adini 0 Ada Adini (1855 – February 1924) was an American operatic soprano who had an active international career from 1876 up into the first decade of the 20th century. She possessed a large, expressive voice which enabled her to sing a broad range of roles that extended from the coloratura soprano repertoire to dramatic soprano parts. She made five recordings with Fonotipia Records in Paris in 1905. Ada_Adini ( 1855 – February 1924 ) was an_American_operatic_soprano who had an_active_international_career from 1876 up into the_first_decade of the_20th_century . She possessed a_large_,_expressive_voice which enabled her to_sing a_broad_range of roles that extended from the_coloratura_soprano_repertoire to dramatic_soprano_parts . She made five_recordings with Fonotipia_Records in Paris in 1905 .
